glow-fix.name: Glow Layering Fix
glow-fix.description:
Does some silly stuff to fix the Ship/UFO glow overlaying the entire cube in the garage, making it look more accurate to in-game. 

<cr>Shouldn't cause any issues, but disable if you encounter any with icon coloring, layering or similar.</c>

glow-iconic-fix.name: Glow Layering Fix - Megahack Compat
glow-iconic-fix.description:
Attempt at adding compatibility with Megahack v9's Iconic Feature. 

This switches from hiding the Glow Sprite on the Player Icon to setting its scale to 0, since Megahack forces it to be visible, breaking the normal fix. 

If enabled, this, unfortunately, will not display whatever glow Color/Effect you have set in Megahack, as the glow sprite is still being hidden. Therefore, you will need to decide whether you prefer Iconic's live garage preview or the Glow Layering fix. 

<cr>Up to you if you wanna enable this! This is mainly if you don't use Iconic much and it breaks the Glow Preview for normal colors.</c>

reload-btn.name: Reload Button (Read Info!)
reload-btn.description:
Adds a button to the garage to reload the icon preview. This is added for compatibility with the **Separate Dual Icons** mod, meant to be used ***<cy>after switching P1-P2 icon sets.</c>*** 
<cg>This is here for convenience</c>, however if you don't wish to add yet another button to your garage, icon previews are reloaded on icon change, so you don't need to re-enter the garage for them to be updated. 

 <cr>Not the best possible way to make compatibility, i know, but i'm not bothering with finding a better one for now. Sorry</c> 



























 <c-808080>Contributions are welcome ..... ;))))))))))</c>
